summary: Add a new video section featuring the 'Glass Half Empty' video between the experience and contact sections. The implementation will use HTML5 video element with custom styling that matches the existing glass-morphism design theme. The video will be clickable to play/pause with sound, appropriately sized for non-HD quality, and fully responsive across devices.

action_plan.description: Add navigation link for the new video section in the navbar menu
Insert the video section HTML structure between experience and contact sections, following the established section pattern with container, section-title, and content areas
Add CSS styling for the video section including glass-morphism background, responsive video container, custom play/pause controls, and hover effects that match the existing design aesthetic
Implement responsive design breakpoints for the video section to ensure proper display on mobile devices, tablets, and desktop screens
Add fade-in animation support for the video section by including appropriate CSS classes and ensuring it integrates with the existing scroll animation system
Update the JavaScript navigation system to handle the new video section link and ensure smooth scrolling behavior
Test the video section across different browsers and devices to ensure proper video playback, responsive behavior, and consistent styling

risks: Video file size (16MB) may impact page load performance on slower connections
Browser compatibility issues with .mov format - may need to provide additional formats (mp4, webm)
Mobile device video playback restrictions may prevent autoplay or require user interaction
Video aspect ratio may not fit well with the existing layout on certain screen sizes
Accessibility concerns for users who cannot view video content
dependencies: Existing video file at static/videos/glass_half_empty.mov must be accessible
Current CSS custom properties and design system variables
Existing JavaScript scroll animation and navigation systems
Font Awesome icons for potential video controls
Responsive grid system and breakpoint definitions
Glass-morphism design theme consistency with backdrop-filter support
issue_title: Feature Request: Add video section with playable 'Glass Half Empty' video
